name: Winxupdatecontroller
body:
### Winxupdatecontroller
Made with C#, WinXUpdateController simply enables and disables the windows update service in Windows 10. The setting is not directly available in this verison of windows. 

### Support or Contact
lunasunkaiser@gmail.com // [rajatsharma.rocks](https://rajatsharma.rocks)
